children.text: CCSS.ELA-Literacy.W.3.1.a Introduce the topic or text they are writing about, state an opinion, and create an organizational structure that lists reasons.
CCSS.ELA-Literacy.W.3.1.b Provide reasons that support the opinion.
CCSS.ELA-Literacy.W.3.1.c Use linking words and phrases (e.g., because , therefore , since , for  example ) to connect opinion and reasons.
CCSS.ELA-Literacy.W.3.1.d Provide a concluding statement or section.

text: CCSS.ELA-Literacy.W.3.1 Write opinion pieces on topics or texts, supporting a point of view with reasons.
